evidence.text: Person A: Berniece say you all going down to the bank.
Person A: Tell him what you told me. Tell him about the three hobos.
Person A: Go on. I told him you was a preacher. He didn’t want to believe me. Tell him about the three hobos.

Person B: That’s what I told Berniece. You working every day you ought to be able to borrow some money.
Person B: That be nice. You ought to go ahead and get married. Berniece don’t need to be by herself. I tell her that all the time.
Person A: Well, let her find that out then. If Avery blessing the house is gonna make her feel better...what you got to do with it?
